allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add auto-fill notes feature from notification settings

Add note_fill column to notification_data table allowing automatic population of scan notes when a barcode triggers a notification. Notes are appended directly to the database without affecting the UI input field.

Changes:
- Add note_fill (NVARCHAR(1000)) column to notification_data schema
- Create migration script for adding note_fill to existing databases
- Update NotificationService to handle note_fill in CRUD operations
- Update ScanService to append note_fill to notes before saving to scan_logs
- Enhance notification management UI with note_fill input field
- Support note_fill in Excel import/export functionality

The feature allows users to configure predefined note templates per notification that are automatically added to scan records when the notification is triggered.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
